about_the_game:
Inspired by the Japanese chip-tunes of the early 90's, we bring you the awesome soundtrack of Void 21, created by our dear friend Lex Dumitru

Track 1: Enter the Void
Track 2: Wireframe Velocity
Track 3: Neon Hyperway
Track 4: Crimson Horizon
Track 5: Glitchout
detailed_description:
Inspired by the Japanese chip-tunes of the early 90's, we bring you the awesome soundtrack of Void 21, created by our dear friend Lex Dumitru

Track 1: Enter the Void
Track 2: Wireframe Velocity
Track 3: Neon Hyperway

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Penguin
  • Processor: Penguin?
  • Memory: 123 MB RAM
  • Graphics: If you can play MP3s from the terminal, good on you! The rest of you get some form of graphics card
  • Storage: 123 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Would be nice
  • Additional Notes: GET A PENGUIN!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Yes
  • Processor: Yes
  • Memory: 123 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Would help but not strictly required
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Kind of needed
  • Additional Notes: I challenge you to a dance-a-thon!

name: Void 21 Official Sound Track
